history.narrative: Law 3-135 was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 3-331, which was referred to the Committee on Finance and Revenue. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on September 16, 1980 and September 30, 1980, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on October 2, 1980, it was assigned Act No. 3-256 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
